snippet: The revised plan for the proposed oil pipeline is still a threat to the environment.
abstract: Editorial notes State Department's latest assessment of revised Keystone XL oil pipeline plan, which acknowledges process of extracting and burning oil will be dirtier than previously thought, still understates its long-term environmental damage; presses Pres Obama to refuse to approve proposed pipeline that can only add to growing problem of climate change.
lead_paragraph: The revised plan for the proposed oil pipeline is still a threat to the environment.

headline.seo: When to Say No to the Keystone XL
